data.title: Company profile AERZEN Peru
data.text:
Aerzen Andina Peru was founded in 2014 due to the growing market trends in Peru. This move aimed to better address all the requirements of this country.

The offices and workshop are strategically located in Lurin, allowing for more effective customer service across all regions.

Aerzen Andina Peru specializes in the sales, installation, maintenance, and repair of Aerzen blowers, compressors, and vacuum pumps, providing comprehensive engineering solutions for various industrial applications. The primary goals of Aerzen Andina Peru include increasing the sales of Aerzen products in Peru and delivering the highest quality of service to all customers. The company boasts a team of highly skilled engineers and technicians, along with an extensive range of spare parts and availability to consistently meet customer expectations.
